name: CodePushPromote
description: Promote the latest CodePush release from one app deployment to another
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: accessKey
inputs.label: Access Key
inputs.helpMarkDown: Access key used to authenticate with the CodePush service.

inputs.name: serviceEndpointCodePush
inputs.label: Service Endpoint
inputs.helpMarkDown: CodePush service endpoint that is configured with your account credentials.

inputs.name: serviceEndpointHockeyApp
inputs.label: Service Endpoint
inputs.helpMarkDown: HockeyApp service endpoint that is configured with your account credentials.

inputs.name: appName
inputs.label: App Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the app you want to promote a release for.

inputs.name: sourceDeploymentName
inputs.label: Source Deployment
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the deployment you want to promote the latest release from.

inputs.name: targetDeploymentName
inputs.label: Destination Deployment
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the deployment you want to promote the release to.

inputs.name: rollout
inputs.label: Rollout
inputs.helpMarkDown: Percentage of users this release should be immediately available to. Note that the rollout property will not be inherited from the release being promoted.

inputs.name: description
inputs.label: Description
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Description of the changes made to the app in this release. Selecting "Inherit" will use the description from the release being promoted.
Note: This can be set to **$(Release.ReleaseDescription)** if being run within a release definition, and you want to inherit the release's description.

inputs.name: appStoreVersion
inputs.label: Target Binary Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Semver expression that specifies the binary app version(s) this release is targeting (e.g. 1.1.0, ~1.2.3). Selecting "Inherit" will use the target binary version from the release being promoted.

inputs.name: isMandatory
inputs.label: Mandatory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Whether this release should be considered mandatory. Selecting "Inherit" will use the mandatory attribute from the release being promoted.

inputs.name: isDisabled
inputs.label: Disabled
inputs.helpMarkDown: Whether this release should be immediately downloadable. Selecting "Inherit" will use the disabled attribute from the release being promoted.
